item.title: The Stranger
item.description: As a rule, vampires are bloodthirsty and unscrupulous monsters, without special moral principles and restrictions. But Martin – the protagonist of this film, it is not so. And even you can not guess about his vampire life, because it behaves like a normal person. Vampirism your character perceives painful as deadly, incurable disease... But may still have some remedy? It is for this Martin embarks on a journey to my once native city. He needs to find a woman named Anna, but she died a long time ago…

item.title: Us
item.description: Married couple embarks on a long-awaited vacations with the children. They have long planned to spend the holiday together and even agreed with friends, where exactly will rest. The road to the beach was pretty long, but finally they have reached the right place and moved into a rented house. Now nothing can stop them enjoy, forget about all your everyday problems and concerns. They had a great day, but at night it becomes clear to them that quiet time is left behind. The thing is that before their house appeared uninvited guests who are not going to go away until they take away their lives. The strangest thing that they look exactly like they know in advance all their actions. Will the family be saved from themselves?

item.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
item.description: Action movie occur in the huge metropolis Reim-city, where people live close to Pokemon. Tim is a guy who's dreamt to become a trainer Pokemon. His father Harry is a real legend of the police station, which was the best detective. Man mysteriously disappeared and nobody can find it. Tim really wants to find it, but realizes that most cope with such a complex task will be incredibly difficult. But one night, he encounters a pretty-type Pokémon, Pikachu, who calls himself supersyshhikom. It offers its assistance and the guy claims that they are bound to find Harry.

item.title: The Maze Runner
item.description: The first part of the plot is based on the eponymous book by James Djeshnera. Once the hero of the paintings sent to lift, not to walk the stairs. As a result, he finds himself in a strange place in the company of 60 teenagers. All they do not remember anything about himself, except for the name. Our hero's name is Thomas. And the place in which he ended up here is called Glejdom. Teens themselves call themselves glejderami. They are in a confined space, the square around which is an impassable maze. The main objective of all the guys-this pass it, because this is the only chance to go back and remember her past.

item.title: Past Malice: An Emma Fielding Mystery
item.description: The archeologist Emma Fielding is invited for consultation at sale of the ancient castle which if to trust legegda, was damned. item.title: The Rake
item.description: There passed twenty years since in the face of juveniles Ben and Ashley the psychopath cruelly killed their parents, and then cut to itself a throat.
